thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 35 of 538
thread.title: Julie Jensen

author: Julie Jensen
title: Julie Jensen
text: I received a gift certificate and while trying to redeem it on a purchase, first it was accepted as store credit, then it said redeemed and then it wouldn't take it off my total. I am trying really hard to like this site but it is so much easier at many others that I shop regularly. In the mean time I have paid full price and I still can't redeem my credit...beyond frustrating
